00041 struct RsiSetTraits {
00042   bool operator()(const RangeStateInfo *x, const RangeStateInfo *y) const {
00043     if (x->table.id < y->table.id)
00044       return true;
00045 
00046     if (x->table.id > y->table.id)
00047       return false;
00048 
00049     return std::strcmp(x->range.end_row, y->range.end_row) < 0;
00050   }
00051 };
00052 
00053 typedef std::set<RangeStateInfo *, RsiSetTraits> RsiSet;
00054 typedef std::pair<RsiSet::iterator, bool> RsiInsRes;
00055 typedef RangeServerMetaLogReader Reader;
00056 
00057 void load_entry(Reader &rd, RsiSet &rsi_set, RangeLoaded *ep) {
00058   RangeStateInfo *rsi = new RangeStateInfo(ep->table, ep->range,
00059       ep->range_state, ep->timestamp);
00060   RsiInsRes res = rsi_set.insert(rsi);
00061 
00062   if (!res.second) {
00063     HT_WARN_OUT <<"Duplicated RangeLoaded "<< ep <<": "<< rd.path()
00064                 << " at "<< rd.pos() <<"/"<< rd.size() <<'\n'
00065                 << ep->table << ep->range << HT_END;
00066     delete rsi;
00067   }
00068 }
00069 
00070 void load_entry(Reader &rd, RsiSet &rsi_set, SplitStart *ep) {
00071   RangeStateInfo ri(ep->table, ep->range);
00072   RsiSet::iterator it = rsi_set.find(&ri);
00073 
00074   if (it == rsi_set.end()) {
00075     HT_ERROR_OUT <<"Unexpected SplitStart "<< ep << HT_END;
00076     HT_ERRORF("Unexpected split start entry at %lu/%lu in %s", (Lu)rd.pos(),
00077               (Lu)rd.size(), rd.path().c_str());
00078     return;
00079   }
00080   (*it)->transactions.push_back(ep);
00081   (*it)->range_state = ep->range_state;
00082 }
00083 
00084 void load_entry(Reader &rd, RsiSet &rsi_set, SplitDone *ep) {
00085   RangeStateInfo ri(ep->table, ep->range);
00086   RsiSet::iterator it = rsi_set.find(&ri);
00087 
00088   if (it == rsi_set.end() ||
00089       (*it)->transactions.empty() ||
00090       (*it)->transactions.front()->get_type() != RS_SPLIT_START) {
00091     HT_ERROR_OUT <<"Unexpected SplitDone "<< ep << HT_END;
00092 
00093     if (it != rsi_set.end())
00094       HT_DEBUG_OUT << *it << HT_END;
00095 
00096     HT_ERRORF("Unexpected split done entry at %lu/%lu in %s", (Lu)rd.pos(),
00097               (Lu)rd.size(), rd.path().c_str());
00098     return;
00099   }
00100   (*it)->transactions.clear();
00101   (*it)->range_state.clear();
00102 }
00103 
00104 void load_entry(Reader &rd, RsiSet &rsi_set, SplitShrunk *ep) {
00105   RangeStateInfo ri(ep->table, ep->range);
00106   RsiSet::iterator it = rsi_set.find(&ri);
00107 
00108   if (it == rsi_set.end() ||
00109       (*it)->transactions.empty() ||
00110       (*it)->transactions.front()->get_type() != RS_SPLIT_START) {
00111     HT_ERROR_OUT <<"Unexpected SplitShrunk "<< ep << HT_END;
00112 
00113     if (it != rsi_set.end())
00114       HT_DEBUG_OUT << *it << HT_END;
00115 
00116     HT_ERRORF("Unexpected split shrunk entry at %lu/%lu in %s", (Lu)rd.pos(),
00117               (Lu)rd.size(), rd.path().c_str());
00118     return;
00119   }
00120   (*it)->transactions.push_back(ep);
00121   // update shrunk range
00122   (*it)->range = ep->range;
00123   (*it)->range_state = ep->range_state;
00124 }

00137 
00138 void load_entry(Reader &rd, RsiSet &rsi_set, DropTable *ep) {
00139   RsiSet::iterator it = rsi_set.begin();
00140   RsiSet::iterator tmpit;
00141 
00142   while (it != rsi_set.end()) {
00143     if ((*it)->table.id == ep->table.id) {
00144       tmpit = it;
00145       ++it;
00146       rsi_set.erase(tmpit);
00147     }
00148     else
00149       ++it;
00150   }
00151 }

00156 namespace Hypertable {
00157 
00158 RangeServerMetaLogReader::RangeServerMetaLogReader(Filesystem *fs,
00159                                                    const String &path)
00160     : Parent(fs, path) {
00161   uint8_t buf[RSML_HEADER_SIZE];
00162   size_t nread = fs->read(fd(), buf, RSML_HEADER_SIZE);
00163 
00164   HT_EXPECT(nread == RSML_HEADER_SIZE, Error::METALOG_BAD_RS_HEADER);
00165 
00166   MetaLogHeader header(buf, RSML_HEADER_SIZE);
00167 
00168   HT_EXPECT(!strcmp(header.prefix, RSML_PREFIX), Error::METALOG_BAD_RS_HEADER);
00169   HT_EXPECT(header.version == RSML_VERSION, Error::METALOG_VERSION_MISMATCH);
00170 
00171   pos() += nread;
00172 }
00173 
00174 RangeServerMetaLogReader::~RangeServerMetaLogReader() {
00175   foreach(RangeStateInfo *i, m_range_states) delete i;
00176 }
00177 
00178 MetaLogEntry *
00179 RangeServerMetaLogReader::read() {
00180   ScanEntry entry;
00181 
00182   if (!next(entry))
00183     return 0;
00184 
00185   StaticBuffer buf(entry.buf);
00186   return new_from_payload(RangeServerMetaLogEntryType(entry.type),
00187                           entry.timestamp, buf);
00188 }
00189 
00190 const RangeStates &
00191 RangeServerMetaLogReader::load_range_states(bool force) {
00192   if (!force && m_range_states.size())
00193     return m_range_states;      // already loaded
00194 
00195   if (pos() > RSML_HEADER_SIZE) {
00196     // need to start from scratch, as seek doesn't work on buffered reads yet
00197     RangeServerMetaLogReaderPtr p(new RangeServerMetaLogReader(&fs(), path()));
00198     p->load_range_states();
00199     p->m_range_states.swap(m_range_states);
00200     return m_range_states;
00201   }
00202   RsiSet rsi_set;
00203 
00204   for (MetaLogEntry *p = read(); p; p = read()) {
00205     switch (p->get_type()) {
00206     case RS_RANGE_LOADED:
00207       load_entry(*this, rsi_set, (RangeLoaded *)p);     break;
00208     case RS_SPLIT_START:
00209       load_entry(*this, rsi_set, (SplitStart *)p);      break;
00210     case RS_SPLIT_DONE:
00211       load_entry(*this, rsi_set, (SplitDone *)p);       break;
00212     case RS_SPLIT_SHRUNK:
00213       load_entry(*this, rsi_set, (SplitShrunk *)p);     break;
00214     case RS_MOVE_START:
00215       load_entry(*this, rsi_set, (MoveStart *)p);       break;
00216     case RS_MOVE_PREPARED:
00217       load_entry(*this, rsi_set, (MovePrepared *)p);    break;
00218     case RS_MOVE_DONE:
00219       load_entry(*this, rsi_set, (MoveDone *)p);        break;
00220     case RS_DROP_TABLE:
00221       load_entry(*this, rsi_set, (DropTable *)p);       break;
00222     default:
00223       HT_FATALF("Bad code: unhandled entry type: %d", p->get_type());
00224     }
00225   }
00226   std::copy(rsi_set.begin(), rsi_set.end(), back_inserter(m_range_states));
00227   return m_range_states;
00228 }

00230 std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &out, const RangeStateInfo &info) {
00231   out <<"{RangeStateInfo: table="<< info.table <<"\n  range="<< info.range;
00232 
00233   if (info.transactions.size()) {
00234     out <<"\n  transactions=(\n";
00235 
00236     foreach(const MetaLogEntryPtr &ptr, info.transactions)
00237       out <<"    "<< ptr.get() <<'\n';
00238 
00239     out <<"  )";
00240   }
00241   out <<"\n}\n";
00242   return out;
00243 }
